description: Every man dreams about having a new car at some point. Take this video as an educational lesson how such dreams can get you into trouble. This boy spent all his money on a new car. And that was just for a deposit. He expected to pay the rest from his salary. Then suddenly, he got fired. He got a layoff compensation but still needed 28 000 to fully pay for the car. Otherwise he would loose the deposit. He called for my help and I was more than happy to get him out of trouble. Obviously, his girlfriend didn´t know about it and he didn´t want to look like a fool. Her father had already lent our boy a considerable amount, which was embarrassing enough. To make his dream to come true, he just had to give up his ass virginity.
title: Debt Dandy 223
